mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM kanban_columns WHERE kanban_column_id = #{kanbanColumnId}) AS result

SELECT kco.kanban_column_id , kco.kanban_column_name , kco.column_seq , kca.kanban_card_id , kca.title , kca.content , kca.card_seq , kca.priority , kca.task_size , kca.start_at , kca.end_at , kca.created_at FROM kanban_columns kco INNER JOIN kanban_cards kca ON kca.kanban_column_id = kco.kanban_column_id WHERE kco.kanban_column_id = #{kanbanColumnId}
SELECT kanban_column_id, kanban_column_name, column_seq FROM kanban_columns WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
mapper.delete: UPDATE kanban_columns SET deleted_at = Now() WHERE kanban_column_id = #{kanbanColumnId}
